title: Lin Shi Jie
description: 林師姐慈心素食, located at 高雄市鼓山區華榮路337-1號, is typically crowded. Food service is quick and seating is open air tables. Offers a a large array of dishes with a colorful photo menu. Also you could choose the ingredients you want, and the kitchen cooks it for you. Often has zongzi (bamboo leaf wrapped sticky rice triangle). Try th cold peanut sauce multi-color noodles.
